name: PatternGenerator

screenshots.caption: A dialog for editing the parameters of a Pattern 2.

short_description:
PatternGenerator is Java application with a Swing GUI.  As its unimaginative name suggests, it generates graphical patterns by means of algorithms.  It is currently able to generate only two kinds of pattern:
(1) an interference pattern whose point sources are circles, ellipses or regular polygons, and
(2) a pattern composed of a set of non-intersecting polygonal paths drawn on an invisible equilateral triangular grid.
The generated patterns can be displayed as static images or as animations.  The static images can be saved as PNG files, and the animations can be saved as a sequence of PNG files that can be converted to a video by a tool such as FFmpeg.
summary: Algorithmically generates two kinds of graphical pattern
